item.title: MLB win rate regression
item.description: Last time we build a mlb team data by python. So this time we will bulid a suitable model for our data. And now we want to focus on win rate, so I let the team win rate be the response. In this time, I will read the data at first. Then bulid the full model and check whether it collinear or not. 上次我們通過p

item.title: CRE Bacteria Data Analysis
item.description: 在這個資料中，我們有兩種細菌。前面的46個觀察值是CRE，後面的49個則不是。 我們希望將資料分類為是否為 CRE。Peak是蛋白質的名稱，而P
